Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive/Kafkan Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Kafkan Way and Wakeforest Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Wakeforest Road runs north and south through a good part of the eastern side of town. To the south, you can see it running parallel to the City Walls, which have been re-built to incorporate the Allakaren Pyramid within the safty of the city's protection. The Dwarven shrine of Moradin lies on the southwestern corner of the intersection.
